title: ZCRUM
description: ZCRUM is a Jira-like project management tool designed to streamline agile workflows. It helps teams efficiently track tasks, manage sprints, and enhance collaboration through an intuitive Kanban board and backlog system.

title: GitHub Clone
description: A stunning replica of GitHub's homepage.

title: Task Organizer
description: A task management app for prioritizing work & increasing productivity.

title: Dynamic Form Generator
description: Create dynamic, interactive forms without coding.

title: Kanban Board
description: Visualize and track tasks in agile teams.

title: Ecommerce Application
description: Enhanced UX and optimized product search in an e-commerce platform.
